compilerOptions.description: Instructs the TypeScript compiler how to compile .ts files.

lib.description: List of library files to be included in the compilation.

allowJs.description: Allow JavaScript files to be compiled.

outFile.description: Concatenate and emit output to single file.

outDir.description: Redirect output structure to the directory.

rootDir.description: Specify the root directory of input files.

removeComments.description: Do not emit comments to output.

downlevelIteration.description: Provide full support for iterables in 'for-of', spread, and destructuring when targeting 'ES5' or 'ES3'.

isolatedModules.description: Transpile each file as a separate module (similar to 'ts.transpileModule').

noImplicitAny.description: Raise error on expressions and declarations with an implied 'any' type.

strictFunctionTypes.description: Enable strict checking of function types.

strictBindCallApply.description: Enable strict 'bind', 'call', and 'apply' methods on functions.

strictPropertyInitialization.description: Enable strict checking of property initialization in classes.

noImplicitThis.description: Raise error on 'this' expressions with an implied 'any' type.

alwaysStrict.description: Parse in strict mode and emit 'use strict' for each source file.

noImplicitReturns.description: Report error when not all code paths in function return a value.

noFallthroughCasesInSwitch.description: Report errors for fallthrough cases in switch statement.

baseUrl.description: Base directory to resolve non-absolute module names.

paths.description: A series of entries which re-map imports to lookup locations relative to the 'baseUrl'.

rootDirs.description: List of root folders whose combined content represents the structure of the project at runtime.

typeRoots.description: List of folders to include type definitions from.

types.description: Type declaration files to be included in compilation.

allowSyntheticDefaultImports.description: Allow default imports from modules with no default export.

esModuleInterop.description: Enables emit interoperability between CommonJS and ES Modules.

preserveSymlinks.description: Do not resolve the real path of symlinks.

skipLibCheck.description: Skip type checking of declaration files.

forceConsistentCasingInFileNames.description: Disallow inconsistently-cased references to the same file.

tsBuildInfoFile.description: Specify file to store incremental compilation information.

composite.description: Enable constraints that allow a TypeScript project to be used with project references.

include.description: Files or patterns to include in the compilation.

exclude.description: Files or patterns to exclude from the compilation.

extends.description: Path to base configuration file to inherit from.
